channel.title: Michael De Luca on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: One Battle After Another Ends for Warner Bros. Movie Chiefs Michael De Luca and Pamela Abdy
item.description: Their latest victory is ‘The Conjuring: Last Rites,’ which scored the top-opening of all time for a horror film at the global box office.
